name: Combined Section Officers' (Grade 'B') Limited Departmental Competitive Examination (LDCE), 2024

eligibility.service: Minimum of five years of approved service in the respective feeder cadre
eligibility.education: Bachelor's degree from a recognized university

details.selection_process: Written Examination followed by Evaluation of Service Records

papers.name: Paper-I: General Studies and General Knowledge of the Constitution of India and Machinery of Government
Paper-II: Procedure and Practice in the Government of India Secretariat and Attached Offices
Paper-III: Noting and Drafting, Precis Writing

details.contact_information: For more details, refer to the official notification.
